parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from Page 1.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the edge instance. To obtain the instance ID, perform the following steps: Log on to the [Link IoT Edge console](https://iot.console.aliyun.com/le/instance/list). On the **Edge Instances** page, move the pointer over the name of the edge instance that you want to query and obtain the instance ID.

You can also call the [QueryEdgeInstance](~~135214~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Internet of Things (IoT) service instance. This parameter is not required for the public instance but required for Enterprise Edition instances.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 30. Default value: 10.
